name: OFFROAD 2089 (WebGL Tech Demo)
description:
Experimental build of Offroad 2089 running on WebGL. It's far from perfect, but it took a fair bit of work to fit it within the limitations of WebGL.

Controls:

R - Recover

Space - Handbrake

Shift - Boost

WASD - Steering and Accel/Brake

Q - Headlights

E - HONK
